text:
Does anyone have any other tutorials on BinaryBuilder.jl?

They're adding to documentation and any would help.

text: I don't remember whether <@U82RE6STE> did it once

I found BB to be too much of a moving target (and outside things I could properly write about) to include it, I had a post on the rest of the process:
<https://matbesancon.github.io/post/2019-11-04-binary-julia/>

attachments.text: When going native is the only option, at least do it once and well.
